custom_item_1.sql_request: select ksppstvl from sys.x$ksppi x, sys.x$ksppcv y where x.indx=y.indx and x.ksppinm='_trace_files_public';

custom_item_2.sql_request: select value from v$parameter where name like 'global_names';

custom_item_3.sql_request: select value from v$parameter where name like 'remote_os_authent';

custom_item_4.sql_request: select value from v$parameter where name like 'remote_os_roles';

custom_item_5.sql_request: select value from v$parameter where name like 'remote_listener';

custom_item_6.description: 4.06 init.ora - 'audit_trail = OS,DB, DB_EXTENDED, XML, or XML, EXTENDED'
custom_item_6.sql_request: select value from v$parameter where name like 'audit_trail';

custom_item_7.sql_request: select value from v$parameter where name like 'os_authent_prefix';

custom_item_8.sql_request: select value from v$parameter where name like 'os_roles';

custom_item_9.sql_request: select value from v$parameter where name like 'utl_file_dir';

custom_item_10.description: 4.10 init.ora - 'Establish redundant physically separate locations for redo log files.'
custom_item_10.sql_request: select count(value) from v$parameter where name like 'log_archive_duplex_dest';

custom_item_11.description: 4.11 init.ora - 'Specify redo logging must be successful.'
custom_item_11.sql_request: select count(value) from v$parameter where name like 'log_archive_min_succeed_dest';

custom_item_12.sql_request: select value from v$parameter where name like 'sec_case_sensitive_logon';

custom_item_13.sql_request: select value from v$parameter where name like 'sec_max_failed_login_attempts';

custom_item_14.sql_request: select value from v$parameter where name like 'sec_protocol_error_further_action';

custom_item_15.sql_request: select value from v$parameter where name like 'sec_protocol_error_trace_action';

custom_item_16.description: Database Profiles Unlimited Failed Login Attempts
custom_item_16.sql_request: select PROFILE,LIMIT from DBA_PROFILES where RESOURCE_NAME = 'FAILED_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS' AND LIMIT = 'UNLIMITED';

custom_item_17.sql_request: select PROFILE,LIMIT from DBA_PROFILES where RESOURCE_NAME = 'FAILED_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS' AND LIMIT != 'DEFAULT' AND LIMIT < 3;

custom_item_18.sql_request: select PROFILE,LIMIT from DBA_PROFILES where RESOURCE_NAME = 'FAILED_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS' AND LIMIT = 'UNLIMITED';

custom_item_19.sql_request: select PROFILE,LIMIT from DBA_PROFILES where RESOURCE_NAME = 'PASSWORD_LIFE_TIME' AND LIMIT = 'UNLIMITED';

custom_item_20.sql_request: select PROFILE,LIMIT from DBA_PROFILES where RESOURCE_NAME = 'PASSWORD_LIFE_TIME' AND LIMIT != 'DEFAULT' AND LIMIT > 90;

custom_item_21.sql_request: select PROFILE,LIMIT from DBA_PROFILES where RESOURCE_NAME = 'PASSWORD_LIFE_TIME' AND LIMIT = 'UNLIMITED';

custom_item_22.sql_request: select PROFILE,LIMIT from DBA_PROFILES where RESOURCE_NAME = 'PASSWORD_REUSE_MAX' AND LIMIT = 'UNLIMITED';

custom_item_23.sql_request: select PROFILE,LIMIT from DBA_PROFILES where RESOURCE_NAME = 'PASSWORD_REUSE_MAX' AND LIMIT != 'DEFAULT' AND  LIMIT < 20;

custom_item_24.sql_request: select PROFILE,LIMIT from DBA_PROFILES where RESOURCE_NAME = 'PASSWORD_REUSE_MAX' AND LIMIT = 'UNLIMITED';

custom_item_25.sql_request: select PROFILE,LIMIT from DBA_PROFILES where RESOURCE_NAME = 'PASSWORD_REUSE_TIME' AND LIMIT = 'UNLIMITED';

custom_item_26.sql_request: select PROFILE,LIMIT from DBA_PROFILES where RESOURCE_NAME = 'PASSWORD_REUSE_TIME' and LIMIT < 365 AND LIMIT != 'DEFAULT';

custom_item_27.sql_request: select PROFILE,LIMIT from DBA_PROFILES where RESOURCE_NAME = 'PASSWORD_REUSE_TIME' AND LIMIT = 'UNLIMITED';

custom_item_28.sql_request: select PROFILE,LIMIT from DBA_PROFILES where RESOURCE_NAME = 'PASSWORD_LOCK_TIME' and LIMIT = 'UNLIMITED';

custom_item_29.sql_request: select PROFILE,LIMIT from DBA_PROFILES where RESOURCE_NAME = 'PASSWORD_LOCK_TIME' AND LIMIT != 'DEFAULT' AND LIMIT < 1;

custom_item_30.sql_request: select PROFILE,LIMIT from DBA_PROFILES where RESOURCE_NAME = 'PASSWORD_GRACE_TIME' AND LIMIT != 'DEFAULT' and LIMIT < 3;

custom_item_31.description: 9.02 Tablespaces - 'Ensure application users have not been granted quotas on tablespaces.'
custom_item_31.sql_request: select username from DBA_TS_QUOTAS where max_bytes = -1 and username not in ('OLAPSYS', 'WK_TEST', 'SYSMAN');

custom_item_32.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME = 'USER_HISTORY$' and GRANTEE not in ('SYS', 'DBA');

custom_item_33.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME = 'LINK$' and grantee not in ('SYS','DBA');

custom_item_34.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME = 'USER$' and grantee not in ('CTXSYS','SYS','DBA','OLAPSYS','XDB','WKSYS');

custom_item_35.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME='SOURCE$' and grantee not in ('SYS','DBA');

custom_item_36.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME = 'STATS$SQLTEXT';

custom_item_37.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME = 'STATS$SQL_SUMMARY';

custom_item_38.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME like 'X$_%' and grantee not in ('SYS','DBA');

custom_item_39.description: 9.12 Views - 'Prevent access to any DBA_ views'
custom_item_39.sql_request: select distinct GRANTEE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME LIKE 'DBA_%' and grantee not in ('AQ_ADMINISTRATOR_ROLE','SYS','DBA','WKSYS','MDSYS','CTXSYS','OLAPSYS','OWBSYS','OWB$CLIENT','XDBADMIN','SELECT_CATALOG_ROLE');

custom_item_40.sql_request: select distinct GRANTEE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME like 'V$%' and grantee not in ('AQ_ADMINISTRATOR_ROLE','SYS','DBA','WKSYS','CTXSYS','OLAPSYS','OWBSYS','OWB$CLIENT','SELECT_CATALOG_ROLE');

custom_item_41.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME='ALL_SOURCE' and grantee not in ('SYS');

custom_item_42.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME='DBA_ROLES' and grantee not in ('SYS','DBA');

custom_item_43.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME='DBA_SYS_PRIVS' and grantee not in ('SYS','DBA');

custom_item_44.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME='DBA_ROLE_PRIVS' and grantee not in ('SYS','DBA');

custom_item_45.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME='DBA_TAB_PRIVS' and grantee not in ('SYS','DBA');

custom_item_46.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME='DBA_USERS' and grantee not in ('SYS','DBA');

custom_item_47.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME='ROLE_ROLE_PRIVS' and grantee not in ('SYS','DBA');

custom_item_48.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME='USER_TAB_PRIVS' and grantee not in ('SYS','DBA');

custom_item_49.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME='USER_ROLE_PRIVS' and grantee not in ('SYS','DBA');

custom_item_50.description: 9.23 Roles - 'Prevent assignment of roles that have _CATALOG_'
custom_item_50.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_ROLE_PRIVS where GRANTED_ROLE like '%_CATALOG_%' and GRANTEE not in ('DBA','EXP_FULL_DATABASE','IMP_FULL_DATABASE','IX','MDSYS','OLAP_DBA','OLAP_USER','SH','SYS','WKUSER');

custom_item_51.description: 9.24 Synonyms - 'Prevent access to any V$ synonym'
custom_item_51.sql_request: select distinct GRANTEE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME like 'V$%' and grantee not in ('SYS','DBA');

custom_item_52.sql_request: select GRANTEE,PRIVILEGE from DBA_SYS_PRIVS where privilege != 'CREATE SESSION' and GRANTEE not in ('AQ_ADMINISTRATOR_ROLE','DBA','DBSNMP','EXFSYS','EXP_FULL_DATABASE','IMP_FULL_DATABASE','IX','JAVADEBUGPRIV','MDSYS','HR','OE','OEM_MONITOR','OLAPSYS','OLAP_DBA','ORDPLUGINS','ORDSYS','OUTLN','SCHEDULER_ADMIN','SYS','SYSMAN','SYSTEM','WKSYS','BI','CTXSYS','DATAPUMP_EXP_FULL_DATABASE','FLOWS_0300000','OLAP_USER','OWBSYS','XDB','WMSYS','WKUSER','TSMSYS') order by GRANTEE;

custom_item_53.description: 9.27 Privileges - 'Prevent granting of privileges that contain the keyword ANY'
custom_item_53.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_SYS_PRIVS where privilege like '%ANY%' and GRANTEE not in ('AQ_ADMINISTRATOR_ROLE','DATAPUMP_IMP_FULL_DATABASE','DBA','DBSNMP','EXFSYS','EXP_FULL_DATABASE','IMP_FULL_DATABASE','IX','JAVADEBUGPRIV','MDSYS','ORACLE_OCM','OEM_MONITOR','OLAPSYS','OLAP_DBA','ORDPLUGINS','ORDSYS','OUTLN','OWBSYS','SCHEDULER_ADMIN','SPATIAL_WFS_ADMIN_USR','SPATIAL_CSW_ADMIN_USR','SYS','SYSMAN','SYSTEM','WKSYS','WMSYS');

custom_item_54.description: 9.29 Privileges - 'Prevent granting of EXEMPT ACCESS POLICY(EAP)'
custom_item_54.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_SYS_PRIVS where PRIVILEGE='EXEMPT ACCESS POLICY';

custom_item_55.description: 9.30 Privileges - 'Prevent granting of privileges that have WITH ADMIN'
custom_item_55.sql_request: select GRANTEE,PRIVILEGE from DBA_SYS_PRIVS where ADMIN_OPTION='YES' and GRANTEE not in ('AQ_ADMINISTRATOR_ROLE','DBA','SCHEDULER_ADMIN','SYS','SYSTEM','OWBSYS','WMSYS');

custom_item_56.description: 9.31 Privileges - 'Prevent granting of privileges that have WITH GRANT'
custom_item_56.sql_request: select GRANTEE,PRIVILEGE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where GRANTABLE='YES' and GRANTEE not in ('CTXSYS','MDSYS','OLAPSYS','ORDSYS','PUBLIC','SYS','SYSMAN','SYSTEM','WMSYS','OWBSYS','OE');

custom_item_57.description: 9.32 Privileges - 'Prevent granting of privileges that have CREATE'
custom_item_57.sql_request: select GRANTEE,PRIVILEGE from DBA_SYS_PRIVS where privilege like 'CREATE%' and GRANTEE not in ('ANONYMOUS','AQ_ADMINISTRATOR_ROLE','CONNECT','CTXSYS','DBA','DIP','DMSYS','EXFSYS','IMP_FULL_DATABASE','IX','MDSYS','MGMT_USER','OE','OEM_MONITOR','OLAPSYS','OLAP_DBA','OLAP_USER','ORDPLUGINS','ORDSYS','OWBSYS','OWB$CLIENT','RECOVERY_CATALOG_OWNER','RESOURCE','SCHEDULER_ADMIN','SH','SPATIAL_CSW_ADMIN_USR','SPATIAL_WFS_ADMIN_USR','SYS','SYSMAN','SYSTEM','WKPROXY','WKSYS','WKUSER','WMSYS','XDB');

custom_item_58.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_SYS_PRIVS where privilege='CREATE LIBRARY' and GRANTEE not in ('DBA','EXFSYS','MDSYS','OLAPSYS','ORDPLUGINS','ORDSYS','SPATIAL_CSW_ADMIN_USR','SPATIAL_WFS_ADMIN_USR','SYS','WKSYS','XDB');

custom_item_59.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_SYS_PRIVS where privilege='ALTER SYSTEM' and GRANTEE not in ('DBA','DMSYS','SYS','WKSYS');

custom_item_60.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_SYS_PRIVS where privilege='CREATE PROCEDURE' and GRANTEE not in ('DBA','DMSYS','IX','MDSYS','OLAPSYS','OLAP_USER','ORDPLUGINS','ORDSYS','OWBSYS','RECOVERY_CATALOG_OWNER','RESOURCE','SYS','WKSYS');

custom_item_61.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_SYS_PRIVS where privilege='BECOME USER' and GRANTEE not in ('DBA','IMP_FULL_DATABASE','SYS','WKSYS');

custom_item_62.description: 9.37 Privileges - 'Prevent granting of SELECT ANY TABLE'
custom_item_62.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_SYS_PRIVS where privilege='SELECT ANY TABLE' and GRANTEE not in ('DBA','EXP_FULL_DATABASE','IMP_FULL_DATABASE','MDSYS','OLAPSYS','OLAP_DBA','SYS','SYSTEM','WKSYS','WMSYS');

custom_item_63.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_SYS_PRIVS where privilege='AUDIT SYSTEM' and GRANTEE not in ('DBA','SYS','WKSYS','IMP_FULL_DATABASE','DATAPUMP_IMP_FULL_DATABASE');

custom_item_64.sql_request: select distinct GRANTEE from DBA_ROLE_PRIVS where GRANTEE in (select USERNAME from DBA_USERS) and GRANTEE not in ('BI','CTXSYS','DBSNMP','DIP','DMSYS','EXFSYS','HR','IX','MDDATA','MDSYS','MGMT_VIEW','OE','OLAPSYS','ORDPLUGINS','ORDSYS','OUTLN','OWBSYS','PM','SH','SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA','SPATIAL_CSW_ADMIN_USR','SPATIAL_WFS_ADMIN_USR','SYS','SYSMAN','TSMSYS','WKSYS','WK_TEST','WMSYS','XDB');

custom_item_65.sql_request: select GRANTEE,PRIVILEGE from DBA_SYS_PRIVS where GRANTEE='PUBLIC';

custom_item_66.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_SYS_PRIVS where privilege='RESOURCE';

custom_item_67.sql_request: select GRANTEE from DBA_ROLE_PRIVS where GRANTED_ROLE='DBA' and GRANTEE in (select USERNAME from DBA_USERS) and GRANTEE not in ('SYS','SYSMAN','SYSTEM');

custom_item_68.description: 9.43 Packages - 'ACL or Deny access to UTL_FILE'
custom_item_68.sql_request: select GRANTEE,PRIVILEGE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME='UTL_FILE' and GRANTEE='PUBLIC';

custom_item_69.description: 9.44 Packages - 'ACL or Deny access to UTL_TCP'
custom_item_69.sql_request: select GRANTEE,PRIVILEGE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME='UTL_TCP' and GRANTEE='PUBLIC';

custom_item_70.description: 9.45 Packages - 'ACL or Deny access to UTL_HTTP'
custom_item_70.sql_request: select GRANTEE,PRIVILEGE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME='UTL_HTTP' and GRANTEE='PUBLIC';

custom_item_71.description: 9.46 Packages - 'ACL or Deny access to UTL_SMTP'
custom_item_71.sql_request: select GRANTEE,PRIVILEGE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME='UTL_SMTP' and GRANTEE='PUBLIC';

custom_item_72.sql_request: select GRANTEE,PRIVILEGE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME='DBMS_LOB' and GRANTEE='PUBLIC';

custom_item_73.sql_request: select GRANTEE,PRIVILEGE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where TABLE_NAME='DBMS_SYS_SQL' and GRANTEE='PUBLIC';

custom_item_74.sql_request: select GRANTEE,PRIVILEGE from DBA_TAB_PRIVS where OWNER = 'SYS' and TABLE_NAME = 'DBMS_JOB' and GRANTEE = 'PUBLIC';

custom_item_75.description: 9.50 Proxy Authentication - 'Limit the user schema privileges to CREATE SESSION only'
custom_item_75.sql_request: select distinct GRANTEE from DBA_ROLE_PRIVS where GRANTED_ROLE!='CREATE SESSION' and GRANTEE in (select USERNAME from DBA_USERS) and GRANTEE not in ('BI','CTXSYS','DBSNMP','DIP','DMSYS','EXFSYS','HR','IX','MDDATA','MDSYS','MGMT_VIEW','OE','OLAPSYS','ORDPLUGINS','ORDSYS','OUTLN','OWBSYS','PM','SH','SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA','SPATIAL_CSW_ADMIN_USR','SPATIAL_WFS_ADMIN_USR','SYS','SYSMAN','TSMSYS','WKSYS','WK_TEST','WMSYS','XDB');

custom_item_76.description: 9.54 Packages - 'Limit or deny access to DBMS_BACKUP_RESTORE'
custom_item_76.sql_request: SELECT GRANTEE FROM DBA_TAB_PRIVS WHERE TABLE_NAME='DBMS_BACKUP_RESTORE';
